title: Sustainable Tech Gifts: What Consumers Really Want in 2025 and How Brands Are Responding
description: Sustainable Tech Gifts: What Consumers Really Want in 2025 and How Brands Are Responding The holiday season still loves gadgets — but not at the cost of the planet. In 2025, shoppers are more discerning: they want devices that are useful, durable, repairable,…
